text.value: You are recording the ANC 1 visit for .
Please exit out of this form and return once the ANC 1 visit has been completed for .
ANC 1 cannot happen in the future!
Name of Midwife Responsible for Completing ANC 1 for this Client:
Year must be 2 digits and between 1999 and the current year
You have entered a year over 5 years in the past, please check to make sure you have entered the year correctly.
Which information about the stage of pregnancy do you know?
The LMP cannot be after ANC 1 or more than 43 weeks before ANC 1.
The gestational age must be between 0 and 43 weeks.
The EDD cannot be more than 3 weeks before ANC 1 or more than 40 weeks after ANC 1.

* LMP:
* EDD:
* Gestional Age: Weeks
If this is incorrect, please return to the previous screen to edit.

* LMP:
* EDD:
* Gestional Age: Weeks
If this is incorrect, please return to the previous screen to edit.
Do you know how many folic acid tablets were given during ANC 1?
How many tablets of ferrous sulphate / folic acid were provided?
You cannot enter a number below 0.
What is the status of TT1?
Do you know the date for TT1?
What is the status of TT2?
Do you know the date for TT2?
What is the status of TT3?
Do you know the date for TT3?
What is the status of TT4?
Do you know the date for TT4?
What is the status of TT5?
Do you know the date for TT5?
Is positive for HIV? (this information will not be automatically shared with the Health Post)
Has been initiated on treatment? (this information will not be automatically shared with the Health Post)
Do you have the information from the **Integrated Antenatal, Labor, Delivery, Newborn, and Postnatal Care Card**?
Do you have the information from the **Integrated Antenatal, Labor, Delivery, Newborn, and Postnatal Care Card**?
Gravidity must be at least 1 and less than 40.
Parity may not be greater than gravidity.
History of 3 or more consecutive spontaneous abortions?
Isoimmunization Rh (..) in current or in previous pregnancy?
Diastolic blood pressure 90mm Hg or more at booking?
Any other severe medical disease or condition like malaria, TB, HIV?
Systolic Blood Pressure must be between 70 and 240.
Diastolic Blood Pressure must be between 40 and 140.
Weight must be between 30 and 150 kg.
Where will the ANC 2 appointment occur?
Does have an ANC 2 appointment date?

What is the ANC 2 date?
Earliest Date: ****
Latest Date: ****

What is the ANC 2 date?
Earliest Date: ****
Latest Date: ****
That date is not in the recommended range.
This was the last ANC visit for .
